wp:term.wp:term_description: Recipient was mentioned in an activity update.
A member has replied to an activity update that the recipient posted.
A member has replied to a comment on an activity update that the recipient posted.
Recipient has registered for an account.
Recipient has registered for an account and site.
A member has sent a friend request to the recipient.
Recipient has had a friend request accepted by a member.
Recipient was mentioned in a group activity update.
A member has sent a group invitation to the recipient.
Recipient's status within a group has changed.
A member has requested permission to join a group.
Recipient had requested to join a group, which was accepted.
Recipient had requested to join a group, which was rejected.
Recipient has received a private message.
Recipient has changed their email address.

item.title: Supported Addons
item.dc:creator: javo
item.content:encoded:
For Listing Advanced options by Addons!

As you see our demo, directory theme works fine without any addons. However, if you need advanced options, you can always purchase and add them.
It's on a sale. You can get good deals. 

Please don't forget to see demos with addons. pages are below this menu.

About Addons

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum

Where does it come from? Contrary to popular belief

Here are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum

Addons Event for
Early birds

It's already on a sale. But you can still get 50% off discount coupon.
50% off of the sale price. Hurry up! it's only limited period!
Please contact our support team to get a coupon, after you purchase our theme.

Contact Support Team Themes Users Active Installs

Still Have A Question?

If you have any question, please feel free to contact us.

If you already purchased our theme, you can contact our support team. 

If you haven't purchased, please contact us via email.

javothemes@gmail.com
